item.description:
We are now offering New England Hiking Meetup Logo polyester wicking mesh T shirts in PERFORMANCE FABRICS.

We are set up with The Ink Factory, Claremont, NH for embroidered 2 color logo shirts and pullovers.

I'm supporting my local community.....and see hands on what we are getting. I like good quality shirts and if this is going to be your favorite hiking shirt- it has to hold up and look good.
Since we are a small order, we are going to custom order the shirts.

Pick the shirt your interested in, model # color and size. There are many colors and styles to chose from- I can also try to get other shirts from other companies, just give me the information.

Price includes embroidery on left chest. I will deliver to the meetup (no charge) or mail to you add $5

Include the total price and shipping fee when you order. We are submitting our orders in batches to save on expenses. If you want sometihng different, ask. They deal with all sportswear companies.


HARRITON POLYTECH TEE $17.00 A nice lightweight silky fabric


colors: white, black, dark green, maroon, navy, royal blue
sizes: Sizes: S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL

AUGUSTA SPORTSWEAR
url=http://www.augustasportswear.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet
/CatalogSearchResultView?storeId=10051&langId=-1&catalogId=10051&styleNumber=1010&quickSearchValue=]
[/url]
Augusta Sportswear Style 1010 $21.50

Product Details:100% polyester wicking/antimicrobial knit*Antimicrobial controls the growth of odor causing microbes*Wicks moisture away from the body*Heat sealed label*Self-fabric collar*Double-needle cover stitched collar and armholes*Set-in sleeves*Double-needle hemmed sleeves and bottom*
Also available in Youth, Style 1011. $19.50

Available Colors:Black, Dark Green, Gold, Maroon, Navy, Red, Royal, Silver Grey, White

Sizes S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL

Augusta Sportswear STYLE 1204 - LADIES WICKING/ANTIMICROBIAL RALLY JERSEY $21.50

Product Details 100% polyester wicking/antimicrobial knit * Antimicrobial controls the growth of odor causing microbes * Wicks moisture away from the body * Ladies' fit * Heat sealed label * Self-fabric V-neck collar with accent piping at bottom * Set-in cap sleeves * Double-needle hemmed sleeves and bottom Also available in Girls, Style 1205

Available Colors Black/white, Dark Green/white, Gold/white, Kelly/white, Maroon/white, Navy/white, Orange/white, Purple/white, Red/white, Royal/white, White/black

Woman's Sizes S, M, L, XL, 2XL







Augusta Sportswear STYLE 3830 - MICRO FLEECE HALF-ZIP PULLOVER $41.00

Product Details 100% polyester micro fleece with windstopper * Pill-free * Ultra-soft * Half-zip pullover style * Raglan sleeves with contrast inserts * Spandex binding at cuffs * Dropped tail * Machine-washable * Individually poly-bagged

Available Colors Black/graphite, Dark Green/black, Maroon/black, Navy/graphite, Red/black, Royal/black

Sizes XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL






Augusta Sportswear STYLE 4620 - WICKING MESH LONG SLEEVE JERSEY $35.00

Product Details; 100% polyester wicking mesh *Wicks moisture away from the body *Heat sealed label *1x1 rib-knit collar *Contrast color side inserts *Contrast color top stitching on raglan sleeves *Double-needle hemmed sleeves and bottom

Available Colors: Black/silver Grey, Dark Green/silver Grey, Gold/silver Grey, Maroon/silver Grey, Navy/silver Grey, Orange/silver Grey, Red/silver Grey, Royal/silver Grey, White/silver Grey

Sizes XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL


Augusta Sportswear STYLE 788 - WICKING LONG SLEEVE T-SHIRT $22.50

Product Details 100% polyester wicking knit* Wicks moisture away from the body * Heat sealed label * Self-fabric collar and cuffs * Double-needle coverstitched collar* Set-in sleeves* Double-needle hemmed bottom.
Also available in Youth, Style 789.

Available Colors Black, Dark Green, Gold, Kelly, Maroon, Navy, Orange, Purple, Red, Royal, Silver Grey, Vegas Gold, White

Sizes S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL



ALO W1004 Alo Short-Sleeve Bamboo Tee: $29.00


VAPOR Moisture wick Tee $17.00



Pennant Sportswear Women's Moisture Wick Tee $21.00
Product Code: 180
Description:
* 4 fashion colors: Bahama, Black, Citrus, Fuschia
* moisture wicking
* anti-microbial
* 100% poly micro mesh
* contour side panel
* cap sleeve
* loose fit



Pennant Sportswear Moisture Wicking Active Crew
Product Code: Pennant 176 $21.00
Description:
* 100% micro poly mesh with moisture wicking properties
* "Body mapping" shoulder panels for comfortable fit
* Superb stitching detail and long term performance
* Self fabric crew neck
* Open sleeve and hemmed bottom

Colors: Black, Carolina Blue, Forest, Kelly, Maroon, Navy, Orange, Purple, Red, Royal, Vegas Gold, White




The shirt prices will be what the store charges us & $4.90 priority shipping if I mail the shirt to you. Price varies with style or special sizing.
item.name: New England Hiking Meetup Logo T-shirts
